entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
